posts.post_content:
Posted By: steve yawitz
It's not quite as exciting of a sale as the recent dismantling of my T206 collection, but I did decide today to make a few more cards available: a couple of Trophy Chases (both of which have slightly difficult backs), a few attractive portraits and a g+/vg- Carolina Brights Milligan. Scans and prices are available on my site: [url]http://imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/rawt206s[/url].

All prices include shipping. And all cards are guaranteed - 10 days if you're not happy, 90 days if a major grading company does not assign a numerical grade.

Thanks,
Steve

Posted By: steve yawitz
...for some new additions to my T206 folder. I added close to 20 St. Louisans - mainly f/g through vg- commons though I think a Bresnahan, Waddell and Wallace are in the mix as well. They're all nice cards that I wouldn't mind keeping, but I'm in the midst of rescanning my collection and also wouldn't mind lightening the workload.

Thanks,
Steve

[url]http://imageevent.com/yawie99[/url]

Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hi Steve,

Email sent on the Pelty horizontal for $50.

Thanks,
Rick
